articles.author: Mark Thompson, CNN Business
articles.title: The UK economy is heading back into recession
articles.description: The Bank of England is pumping another £150 billion ($195 billion) into the UK economy after warning of a double-dip recession because of the coronavirus pandemic and an uncertain outlook because of Brexit.

articles.title: The US just reported more than 100,00 new Covid-19 infections, the most cases ever reported in a single day

articles.description: Fox News hosts Tucker Carlson, Sean Hannity and Laura Ingraham parroted talking points from President Donald Trump's campaign to try and sow doubt about the outcome of the US presidential election.

articles.title: GOP strategist: Why Trump's communism talks worked

articles.title: Denmark plans to cull up to 17 million mink to stop mutated coronavirus
articles.description: Denmark, the world's largest producer of mink furs, plans to cull all mink in the country to contain a mutated form of novel coronavirus.

articles.title: Trump's baseless claims of election fraud undermine US credibility overseas
articles.description: For years, the US has held itself up as an arbiter of sorts for the democratic process around the world, President Trump's attempts to delegitimize the vote could change that.
